concept.title: Example: conref redirection
concept.shortdesc: The conkeyref attribute enables authors to share DITA topics that reuse content. It also enables map authors to specify different key definitions for common keys.

conbody.p: In this scenario, Acme produces content for a product that is also resold through a business partner. When the DITA content is published for the partner, several items must be different, including the following:
Simply using the conref attribute would not be possible for teams that use a component content management system where every DITA topic is addressed by a globally-unique identifier (GUID).

conbody.p: When each of the DITA maps is published, the elements that are referenced by conkeyref will use the reuse topic that is referenced by the keydef element in the map. The product names and warnings will be different in the output.
